body_html:
The team has recently released a tool called graph_transforms, which contains (possibly more complete?) similar functionalities that optimize for various deployment use cases: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms

Can you take a look at this newer tool to see if it works?

body:
The team has recently released a tool called `graph_transforms`, which contains (possibly more complete?) similar functionalities that optimize for various deployment use cases: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms

Can you take a look at this newer tool to see if it works?
